This is NOT HD.  This is a cam.  It may be a good cam, but the recording quality if far below HD levels.  So far you have posted three versions of the same thing, claiming they are all HD.  

Since you are one of the few green skullers that actually seem to respond -

What is in this for you?  If you are making $ then I understand, but if not then it makes no sense.

At least you are not NLUPPER002 stretching the hell out of them and calling it 720p.

I do appreciate the effort, do not get me wrong.  It is the spam and the misleading titles which waste my bandwidth and time, which makes me mistrust most people with green skulls anymore.  SceneBalance, TvTeam, S4A, and the other groups are far worse, but they do not even bother to read their comments so I only try to warn people when they start with their crap.

@tflagger997...

I very rarely have time to do my own encoding any more, so I tend to post 'scene' releases now. I didn't make the title up, this was the name given to the release before I uploaded it. Changing the title makes it difficult to search for a particular version, therefore I don't change them (or at least very rarely, normally on the odd occasion when something doesn't do what it says on the tin).

Everyone's opinions are different, and I have seen little to make me believe that that this ISN'T a HDTS, and has been posted with it's original title.

And no, nothing is made from it, it's a rebellious hobby.

This release has the best audio of any source so far, it's a shame that video is so blurry :(

V:7.5 (.5 taken off for the blurriness)
A:9
Thx for UL! good quality for a TS.
